name: “Going Clear” Wine Tumbler
description: Pisscoin Home Collection Summer Season 2021 Catalog #05 - “Just a little taste.” - Keep your $PISS nicely chilled while relaxing outside on a hot day! This Insulated Stainless Steel Wine Tumbler holds 12 oz. and is great for Clear Cucks to sip from in glass-free areas. Features a finger slide splash-proof lid to help keep out pesky summer bugs. Tumbler is not microwave safe or dishwasher safe, and the lid is not leak proof. Buyer of this OBJKT will receive the artist’s proof of the “Going Clear” Wine Tumbler (12 oz) seen here*, signed by Pisscoin Home Collection Chief Creative Officer, Pis Pistofferson. Shipping fees are included for addresses anywhere in the continental United States. After purchase, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram with shipping address. Item will ship within 5-7 days of purchase. For collectors outside the continental US and for all other inquiries about the artwork, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram. *Only for the first sale. Resale is subject to the Guzzler’s Oath. Any collector purchasing this OBJKT through the secondary market should contact the current owner and @dgpgallerie on Instagram to confirm the good(s) for sale.
